snippet: The civil rights lawyer Norman Siegel and another reader write that students abused the First Amendment when they prevented the New York police commissioner, Raymond W. Kelly, from speaking.
lead_paragraph: The civil rights lawyer Norman Siegel and another reader write that students abused the First Amendment when they prevented the New York police commissioner, Raymond W. Kelly, from speaking.

headline.main: Kelly at Brown: A Test of Free Speech on Campus
headline.print_headline: Kelly at Brown: A Test of Free Speech on Campus
